derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from German Lithographie (see litho-, -graphy)

entry.def: Lithography is a method of printing in which a piece of stone or metal is specially treated so that ink sticks to some parts of it and not to others.

means.word_mean: 1. a method of planographic printing from a metal or stone surface
2. the act of making a lithographic print
